review: Anoro Ellipta (umeclidinium / vilanterol):Well I took my first dose of Anoro Ellipta a few hours ago. I forgot how it felt to breath and feel normal again after my Spiriva stopped working! I can now move at work freely, without needing a rescue inhaler!!!I hope this builds up in my system so I feel better longer. So far so good!!!

Anoro Ellipta (umeclidinium / vilanterol):Started Anoro Ellipta two weeks ago. Works really well for me. I've been on advair like meds for years for COPD. This works so much better and only once a day. Expensive with medicare, but really helps me. I'm feel very lucky that I'm able to afford it so far.

Anoro Ellipta (umeclidinium / vilanterol):Only drug I have taken in 2 years of my COPD and it helped but I cannot afford it after got a sample from the Drs office. It really helped at last but I can't afford to buy it
Anoro Ellipta (umeclidinium / vilanterol):It seems to work for me.

My walking has improved dramatically. Over the 5 days I've been taking it my distance has improved 30%, speed has increased 13%, #of rest stops decreased from 4 to 0, and cost has decreased $125/mo over Spiriva   Symbicort.
